timeline.message: Update documentation for the Presto SQL connector
Update documentation for the Presto SQL connector
Update documentation for the Presto SQL connector

timeline.bodyText:
Could you use a descriptive link instead of embedding a URL? Something like this:

Current status of the connector is detailed in the presto-iceberg README.
timeline.author: rdblue
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,4 +17,6 @@
 
 # Presto
 
-An Iceberg connector for Presto is available in [pull request #458 on prestosql/presto](https://github.com/prestosql/presto/pull/458)
+Iceberg connector is part of Presto SQL's master branch, although support for many features is still under development. Current status of the connector is detailed in its README:
+
+https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/master/presto-iceberg/README.md
